content.prompt: Compared with more-developed countries, which of the following statements is true of less developed countries?

choices.label: A higher percent of the labor force is engaged in food production .
The per capita consumption of energy is higher .
The natural increase of the population is lower .

unit.text: 7: Industrial and Economic Development Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe spatial patterns, networks, and relationships.
